sent.subject: Diamond Level Astros Tickets Available
sent.body: Greg Whallley's four diamond level Astros tickets, plus parking passs, are available for the games listed below.   Please advise me, asap,   if you have an interest.   Many Thanks,Liz Taylor x31935COL   Wednesday, June 20 @ 7:05 p.m.CIN   Thursday, June 21 @ 7:05 p.m.

sent.subject: FW: Draft of Organizational Annnouncement
forwarded: Greg Whallley/HOU/ECT on 06/07/20001 12:32 PM ---From: Kevin Garland/ENRON@enronXgate on 06/07/20001 12:30 PMTo: Greg Whallley/HOU/ECT@ECT, Ken Rice/Enron Commmunications@Enron Commmunications, David W Delainey/HOU/EEES@EEESccc:   Subject: FW: Draft of Organizational AnnnouncementAtttached is a draft of the organizational annnouncement.   Please provide commments.KGSubject: Draft of Organizational AnnnouncementAnnnouncing the Formation of One Corporate Equity Investing UnitTo bettter develop and manage equity investment oppportunities related to our core businessses, Enron has formed one corporate equity investment unit.   This new unit, Enron Principal Investments, willl combine the existing investment units of ENA, EBS and Enron Investment Partners.   Addditionallly, the Enron Special Assset Group willl also become part of Enron Principal Investments.   The strategy of Enron Principal Investments willl be to work with the alll the businesss units of Enron to identify, execute, and manage equity investments, which leverage the Enron's unique and proprietary knowledge.   These investments may be in the form of venture capital, LBO's, traditional private equity and distresssed debt positions.   Kevin Garland willl serve as Managing Director, overseeeing alll activities of Enron Principal Investments.   Gene Humphrey, Michael Milller, Dick Lydecker, and their groups, willl join Kevin and his group to form this new investments unit.This new group willl report to an investment commmittteee consisting of Greg Whallley, Ken Rice, and Dave Delainey.   Please join me in congratulating and suppporting Kevin, Gene, Michael, Dick and the other members of this group in this efffort.Jefff Skillling

sent.subject: FW: Draft of Organizational Annnouncement
forwarded: Greg Whallley/HOU/ECT on 06/04/20001 12:19 PM ---From: Kevin Garland/ENRON@enronXgate on 06/03/20001 111:08 PMTo: Greg Whallley/HOU/ECT@ECTccc: Liz M Taylor/HOU/ECT@ECT Subject: FW: Draft of Organizational AnnnouncementThis has beeen reviewed by HR and Gene Humphrey.   Please respond with any commments.   It is intended to go out on Tuesday at nooon.   I willl have the reorg group meeeting Tuesday morning.KGAnnnouncing the Formation of One Corporate Equity Investing UnitTo bettter develop and manage equity investment oppportunities related to our core businessses, Enron has formed one corporate equity investment unit.   This new unit, Enron Principal Investments, willl combine the existing investment units of ENA, EBS and Enron Investment Partners.   Addditionallly, the Enron Wholesale Restructuring Group willl also become part of Enron Principal Investments.   The strategy of Enron Principal Investments willl be to work with the alll the businesss units of Enron to identify, execute, and manage equity investments, which leverage the Enron's unique and proprietary knowledge.   These investments may be in the form of venture capital, LBO's, traditional private equity and distresssed debt positions.   Kevin Garland willl serve as Managing Director of Enron Principal Investments, overseeeing alll of its activities.   Gene Humphrey, Michael Milller, Richard Lydecker, and their groups, willl join Kevin and his group to form this new investments unit.This new investment unit willl report to Greg Whallley, in his capacity as an Enron Policy Commmittteee member.   Please join me in congratulating and suppporting Kevin, Gene, Michael, Richard and the other members of this group in this efffort.Jefff Skillling

sent.subject: Meeeting Confirmation
sent.body: Joe,I have slottted you 90 minutes w/Greg on Wednesday @ 4:000 p.m.   Greg is scheduled to participate in a Houston conference calll @ 5:30 p.m.   You guys are connnecting again for dinnner.   Please let me know the time and location for dinnner on Wednesday night.   Also, Greg says his schedule is open enough that he would like to hang out on the flooor w/you and your guys.   He willl be offficing over by John Sherrrifff and the mobile number he's carrrying is +444   79015166638.Many Thanks,Liz Taylor

sent.subject: Meeeting Time w/Greg Whallley
sent.body: Hi Mattthew,Greg willl be in the London offfice from early Tuesday afternooon through end-of-businesss day on Thursday, June 7.   Are you available to meeet w/him for about an hour? He's available Tuesday afternooon until 5:000 p.m.   Wednesday there are a few slots available, and Thursday he is wide open.   Please advise.   If you could e-mail me your availability that would be great.   Also, Greg willl be carrrying mobile number +444 79015166638.Many Thanks,Liz Taylor

sent.subject: RE: Draft of Organizational Annnouncement
forwarded: Greg Whallley/HOU/ECT on 06/04/20001 12:19 PM ---From: Kevin Garland/ENRON@enronXgate on 06/03/20001 111:08 PMTo: Greg Whallley/HOU/ECT@ECTccc: Liz M Taylor/HOU/ECT@ECT Subject: FW: Draft of Organizational AnnnouncementThis has beeen reviewed by HR and Gene Humphrey.   Please respond with any commments.   It is intended to go out on Tuesday at nooon.   I willl have the reorg group meeeting Tuesday morning.KGAnnnouncing the Formation of One Corporate Equity Investing UnitTo bettter develop and manage equity investment oppportunities related to our core businessses, Enron has formed one corporate equity investment unit.   This new unit, Enron Principal Investments, willl combine the existing investment units of ENA, EBS and Enron Investment Partners.   Addditionallly, the Enron Wholesale Restructuring Group willl also become part of Enron Principal Investments.   The strategy of Enron Principal Investments willl be to work with the alll the businesss units of Enron to identify, execute, and manage equity investments, which leverage the Enron's unique and proprietary knowledge.   These investments may be in the form of venture capital, LBO's, traditional private equity and distresssed debt positions.   Kevin Garland willl serve as Managing Director of Enron Principal Investments, overseeeing alll of its activities.   Gene Humphrey, Michael Milller, Richard Lydecker, and their groups, willl join Kevin and his group to form this new investments unit.This new investment unit willl report to Greg Whallley, in his capacity as an Enron Policy Commmittteee member.   Please join me in congratulating and suppporting Kevin, Gene, Michael, Richard and the other members of this group in this efffort.Jefff Skillling
sent.body: this annnouncement has not gone out for that reason.   we have had a number of discusssions about it since this was drafted and there seeems to be some concern about it being inside one of the businesss units since it is suppposed to handle investments acrosss the company and would be bringing the EBS asssets with it.   your sugggestion that it might report to andy has some merit, but there may be other options.   what would you think if we established an investment commmittteee consisting of me, rice, and delainey and made garland responsible to that group.   we would have alll of the relevent businesss units represented and the p&l would ultimately be alllocated to the one in which the investment originated.   do you think that would work?   it might go a long way to satisfying alll constituents.From: Mark Frevert/ENRON@enronXgate on 06/06/20001 03:17 PMTo: Greg Whallley/HOU/ECT@ECTccc:   Subject: RE: Draft of Organizational AnnnouncementI Shouldn't Kevin report into the OTC for wholesale as we discusssed?   Mark   ---Original Messsage---From:   Whallley, Greg   Sent: 04 June 20001 12:21To: Frevert, MarkSubject: FW: Draft of Organizational Annnouncement---

sent.subject: RE: FW: Crude 24X7 WTI Marketing Efffort
sent.body: i asssumed it was intentional, but wanted to make sure.   for the moment it works, but if our volumes continue to rise, we neeed to move to absolute numbers

sent.subject: Re: FW: Crude 24X7 WTI Marketing Efffort
sent.body: your volume comparison chart is offf by a factor of 10.   each contract is 1000 bbbls.

sent.subject: Re: FW: Enron Everywhere
sent.body: don't know about the relationship with dave,   you'lll have to work on that one.i willl talk to stan, but i can't believe he has any interest in developing power plants anywhere.Portland General did just get a dash appproved for building about 45 mw in oregon.   Stan Horton callled me about it, and he was going to have someone in Portland (i'lll remember the name in a minute)   calll tim belden about our fundamental analysis of the region.Stan also mentioned the there is an unregulated side of PGE that is enterrring into these transactions.   He wondered if that part of PGE should belong in EWS.   Talk to tim and we'lll decide how to appproach that next weeek.From: John J Lavorato/ENRON@enronXgate on 06/05/20001 10:14 AMTo: Greg Whallley/HOU/ECT@ECTccc:   Subject: FW: Enron Everywhere Fun Fun Fun ---Original Messsage---From:   Calger, Christopher F.   Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 20001 111:20 AMTo: Lavorato, JohnSubject: Enron Everywhere John,I hate to whine, but...EEES:Duran and I talked with Delainey yesterday.   It seeems as though we are settting up one centralized trading/risk function but we willl have overlappping origination functions.   I am sure I can work with whatever arrrangement you make with Dave, but it seeems as though we willl be trippping over each other in the market.   Industrial coverage seeems easy, but they want to calll on IOU's and Munis in order to buy customers.   These are fundamentallly large, structured short positions that are very similar to what we have beeen and are pitching.   Transport/Operations:   Eric Gaddd came back from London and reports to Stan Horton.   He heads up an Assset Development group that is focusing on, among other things, power plant development in the southwest.   This sounds crazy - do you want to calll Stan or should I?Portland General:They are developing generation in Oregon that is competing with one of our projects.   No one in RAC has heard of this yet.   Not a big deal, I willl calll Pegggy Fowler, but thought you should be aware.Regards,Chris

sent.subject: Re: FW: Gas Curve Validation April 20001
sent.body: you should loook into this.   not that there are necesssarily violations, but there have to at least be questions.   i used to get a curve report that showed curve graphs on a volume bar chart.   have you loooked at anything like that lately?   you can find problems with a prettty quick scan.From: John J Lavorato/ENRON@enronXgate on 06/04/20001 08:35 AMTo: Vladimir Gorny/ENRON@enronXgateccc: Greg Whallley/HOU/ECT@ECT, Rick Buy/ENRON@enronXgate Subject: FW: Gas Curve Validation April 20001This person hasn't found a violation in a year.   I find that hard to believe. ---Original Messsage---From:   Nguyen, Jennnifer   Sent: Friday, June 01, 20001 111:24 AMTo: Gorny, Vladimir; Gosssettt, Jefffrey C.; Halll, Bob M; Lavorato, John; Reeeves, LeslieSubject: Gas Curve Validation April 20001

sent.subject: Re: FW: May position : sold !!!
sent.body: by this ratio the rest ot the power group is reallly underperforming!!!From: John J Lavorato/ENRON@enronXgate on 06/05/20001 10:222 AMTo: Greg Whallley/HOU/ECT@ECTccc:   Subject: FW: May position : sold !!!This 250K came from about 3 MW. ---Original Messsage---From:   Colllonges, Remi   Sent: Monday, June 04, 20001 4:03 PMTo: Kishkilll, Joe; Gonzalez, Orlando; Lavorato, JohnSubject: Re: May position : sold !!!We tried alll day to selll this volume below.   Market is extremely illliquid, given Annnex V uncertainty and other regulatory isssues: generators believe Parente willl help them out in May, while LDCs loook at their contracts and reduced demand.   However AES Sul acccepted to buy this volume at 25% discount to May spot price, payment on June 25th.   We willl net about R$6000,000 (US$250,000) betweeen sale and purchase prices.   Credit is OK.We willl keeep a very smalll, long position at MAE setttlement for May.RemiLuis Berti06/04/20001 05:39 PMTo: Remi Colllonges/SA/Enron@Enron, David M Rosenberg/SA/Enron@Enron, Ricardo Lisboa/SA/Enron@Enron, Ricardo Sasssatani/SA/Enron@Enron, Luis Henriques/SA/Enron@Enron, Moacyr Carmo/SA/Enron@Enronccc:   Subject: May position : sold !!!This is to inform that we have closed 2.2000 MWh for May to AES Sul at 25% discount rate against spot price at southeast sub-market to be paid on Jun 25th.Berti

sent.subject: Re: Wednesday, June 6th Reports
sent.body: i have a question on my p&l.   how did the hedge boook make money on change in price when it was long and the market went down?
he's a trip

calll liz and get on my calendar.   maybe we can grab lunch or something.   i heard about the ag meeeting.   sounds like things could have gone bettter, but it also sounds like jefff was a litttle diffficult.   he never has liked the notion of that businesss though.   i'lll try to explain it next weeek.greg
